mapper.select: SELECT category ,brand ,price FROM (SELECT b.category, a.brand, b.price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY b.category ORDER BY a.brand) AS rn FROM PRODUCT a, (SELECT category, MIN(price) AS price FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY category ) b WHERE a.category = b.category AND a.price = b.price ) WHERE rn = 1

SELECT a.category, MAX(DECODE(a.price, b.min_price, a.brand)) min_brand, MAX(DECODE(a.price, b.max_price, a.brand)) max_brand, MAX(DECODE(a.price, b.min_price, a.price)) min_price, MAX(DECODE(a.price, b.max_price, a.price)) max_price FROM product a, (SELECT category, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM product GROUP BY category ) b WHERE a.category = #{cate} AND (a.price = b.min_price OR a.price = b.max_price) GROUP BY a.category

SELECT a.brand, a.t_price FROM (SELECT brand, SUM(price) AS t_price FROM product GROUP BY brand ) a WHERE a.t_price = (SELECT MIN(t_price) AS t_price_min FROM (SELECT brand, SUM(price) AS t_price FROM product GROUP BY brand ) )
